Isha Sathsang
Practice Correction Webinar
February, 2017
 

The Adiyogi brought this possibility that a human bring need not be contained in the defined limitations of our species.

- Sadhguru

Monthly Group Meditation (Sathsang)
 

Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

The Isha Monthly Group Meditation is an opportunity to deepen your Kriya with Sadhguru's voice guiding you through the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya. Here are the details of our upcoming Sathsang:
Date & Time: Saturday, February 11 2017, 5 pm - 7:15 pm
Sydney (Please note change in venue)
The Great Hall, Sydney Boys High School
11 Anzac Parade, Moore Park, NSW 2021 (enter via Anzac Parade)
Melbourne
Multicultural Hub, 506 Elizabeth St, Melbourne
Brisbane
Slacks Creek Progress Hall, 151 - 153 Barbaralla Drive, Springwood
Perth
Corinthian Park Hall, Cnr Beatrice Ave & Leach Hwy, Shelley, WA, 6148

Please ensure that

  • you are on empty stomach
  • you are seated in the hall at least 15 minutes before the start time as late comers will not be permitted.

Inner Engineering Online participants
Please be outside the hall door no later than 35 minutes following the start of the session in order to join the Sathsang after the completion of the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya practice.

* Please note that Sathsang will be conducted on the second Saturday of every month across centres in Australia.

Practice Correction Webinar
 

For the first time, we will be offering a practice Q&A session, on Sunday, February 12th through a webinar, to better support you in establishing your Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya. This is an opportunity for you to have your questions or concerns clarified by a trained teacher.

Date & Time: February 12 (Sunday) 2017 8 pm to 9 pm (AEDT)

To participate, please register here:

Register

*This session is open to those of you who have completed the Inner Engineering program and have been initiated into the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya.
Mahashivratri (24 February 2017)
 
Sadhguru invites you to the Consecration of Adiyogi - The Source of Yoga on Mahashivratri to be a part of a moment in history, as a unique face of Adiyogi is consecrated at the Isha Yoga Center this year.
